title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on Eve of England Football Match
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 10 July 2021.
content:
To Gareth Southgate and our England heroes, I want to say thank you.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[EIF]: education inspection framework
  *[
  JTAIs
 ]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[JTAIs]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[
  ILACS
 ]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[ILACS]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[
  SEND
 ]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[EEF]: the Education Endowment Foundation
  *[DfE]: Department for education
  *[
  EIF
 ]: education inspection framework

On and off the field, you’ve shown the best of England during this tournament.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

You’ve been as fearless as the three lions on our crest. You’ve lit up this tournament. And in spite of those who tried to undermine you, you’ve used your platform to stand up for our shared values as a country.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

In doing so, you have become role models not just to a generation of young people, but to an entire nation.

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development

I want you to know that as you line up at Wembley today, the whole of England will be bursting with pride watching you.
